verses.name: Genesis 31:12
verses.text: And he said, Lift up now thine eyes, and see, all the rams which leap upon the cattle are ringstraked, speckled, and grisled: for I have seen all that Laban doeth unto thee.

verses.name: Genesis 31:13
verses.text: I am the God of Beth–el, where thou anointedst the pillar, and where thou vowedst a vow unto me: now arise, get thee out from this land, and return unto the land of thy kindred.

verses.name: Genesis 31:14
verses.text: And Rachel and Leah answered and said unto him, Is there yet any portion or inheritance for us in our father’s house?
